topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5318bec16368723d6c0f0400#post_5318bec16368723d6c0f0400
That would make for a great movie though to base it off the idea of this.  Have mythological figures as real and set it back in medieval times and normal people start to forget about people with the remaining mythological figures screaming at people wondering why people are forgetting and slowly they fade out of existence with the end of the movie going-
"Hey jack frost, what's wrong?"
"Everyone's gone"
"Who's gone?"
"Who are you talking to?"
"Jack Frost"
"Silly, jack frost doesn't exist"
and then jack crying that no one believes in him and then vanishing.

topics.body: Where did everyone go? The forums are awfully quiet today.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
It's Thursday, everyone else has school/jobs/other activities and they need the sleep.

Personally, I like Thursdays, because they are after Wednesday and before Friday, it's a pretty day
